name: Heritage Steak
description: Perfectly grilled, tender cut of premium beef, rich in flavor and beautifully marbled. Served with a generous side of golden, crispy chips, it’s a hearty and satisfying classic that celebrates true steakhouse quality.

name: FireGrill Burger
description: A juicy beef patty flame-grilled to perfection, topped with melted cheddar, crispy onions, and smoky BBQ sauce, served in a toasted brioche bun.

name: Creamy Tuscan Pasta
description: Penne tossed in a rich, creamy sauce with sun-dried tomatoes, spinach, and a hint of garlic — comforting and full of flavor.

name: Spicy Street Tacos
description: Soft tortillas filled with seasoned beef, fresh salsa, jalapeños, and lime crema for a zesty, satisfying bite.

name: Rustic Margherita Pizza
description: Stone-baked pizza topped with mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and fresh basil — simple, classic, and delicious.
